# Alleviate Addiction (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Healing Spells|healing]])

**Level:** [[1st Level Alchemist Spells|Alchemist 1]], [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]], [[1st Level Druid Spells|Druid 1]], [[1st Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 1]], [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]], [[1st Level Shaman Spells|Shaman 1]], [[1st Level Witch Spells|Witch 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 1]], [[BoXM 1st-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 1]], [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 1 hour/level

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Black Markets, pg. 19

The subject ignores the effects of addictions. The subject can naturally recover from damage dealt by the drug if she is under the effects of this spell for the entire duration of her rest.
